permission-denied-message: Access to location information has been denied! Location information is required to display the content.
inside-polygon-message: The pin is inside the polygon
outside-polygon-message: The pin is outside the polygon
route-me-input-error-message: Please enter either time or distance.
route-me-distance-error-message: Please enter a distance between 500m and 300km.
route-me-time-error-message: Please enter a time between 10 minutes and 12 hours.
open-map-error-message: Please press the Route me button to display the route.
change-language-alert-message: Do you want to change the language?
save-error-message: Please enter a route name with at least one character.
explains-map-pin: Long press on the map to place a pin as a waypoint.
route-error-message: Please change the waypoints and try again.
